blog.content:
# Becoming a Web Developer is knowing how to start
## It's about the journey and how we can make it happen

One of the most difficult things in every field is knowing how to start, there are so many options out there and this can be a little bit overwhelming, however it can be done with the proper investigation and discipline.

![business-man-character_87720-803.jpg](http://165.232.151.50/uploads/business_man_character_87720_803_a6d467c811.jpg)


Every mind is a whole world, and everyone can start
